title: How to work for people as a writer - Quora

response.answer_text: You have to find the information about what heading, the buyer provide you. The information you write must not include any others ideas. It will caught as breaking the law of copywriting. So you have to include unique things. As a writer you must include some SEO words and paragraphs. If not the article will not come to the rankings which will not good for buyers. You can write articles to sites so people will buy if it is good. Or else you can work in Fiverr or Upwork where people will give you headings to write articles.

Get a resume up showing where you’ve been published. Have some main pages of your best writing photocopies and scanned so you can send those to prospective clients. Probably the best place to start is Fivver. You have to decide how much to charge. People will contact you and you either send them samples of your work or send them a link to your web site that has copies. Here’s my old one I sent to editors.

Work for people? Think more about businesses or non-profits. PR agencies, advertising agencies, communications consultants. Many businesses have corporate communications people (I did this at one time).

It is very much like applying for an artistic position. You need to provide a history of written products to show your aptitude, skills, and capabilities. If applying for an advertising position, show an prior work. If a content position for a periodical, show articles and written pieces. In addition, if possible, provide references.

That’s dead easy. It’s getting paid… that’s the hard part. You know, actual money you can hold in your hands and look at… and it’s the real deal money, like what you can spend and nobody complains about. The sort of stuff you can examine with a magnifying glass to ascertain it’s genuine and not made of chocolate. The kind that gives a warm feeling in your heart now and then, pays the rent, or the mortgage, or the alimony, like what money does. I’m just saying, that’s all. :
